构造函数详细信息

方法详细信息

readGeneFile

public static java.util.Map<Chromosome,java.util.List<Gene>> readGeneFile(java.lang.String fileName)
                                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
Read gene file into a map. The format for input file is 
 -----------------------
   Field         Type  
 -----------------------
   geneID       int     
   familyID     int     
   Symbol       String  
   Species     String  
   Chromosome   String  
   Orient       String  
   Start        int     
   End          int     
 -----------------------
Fields are separated by tabs. A line starting with "#" will be omitted. InputFileFormatException will be thrown if data type is not correct or a record is not complete. A gene record with null value for type String or 0 value for type int will be omitted.

参数：
fileName - gene file name (including path)
返回：
a map from each chromosome to corresponding gene list
抛出：
java.lang.Exception - IOException or InputFileFormatException

readCHSFile

public static java.util.List<CHS> readCHSFile(java.lang.String fileName)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
Read CHS file into a list. The format for input file is 
 -----------------------
   Field          Type  
 -----------------------
   SpeciesA     String     
   ChromosomeA   String     
   StartA        int  
   EndA          int  
   SpeciesB     String
   ChromosomeB   String  
   StartB        int  
   EndB          int     
   Size          int
   P value       double
 -----------------------
Size and P value are not necessary in the file. Fields are separated by tabs. A line starting with "#" will be omitted. InputFileFormatException will be thrown if data type is not correct or a record is not complete.

参数：
fileName - CHS file name (including path)
返回：
a list containing all CHS
抛出：
java.lang.Exception - IOException or InputFileFormatException

writeCHSFile

public static void writeCHSFile(java.util.List<CHS> CHSList,
                                java.lang.String fileName)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Write all CHS in a list to an output file in text format. The format for output file is 
 -----------------------
   Field           Type  
 -----------------------
   Species A     String     
   Chromosome A   String     
   Start A        int  
   End A          int
   Species B     String  
   Chromosome B   String  
   Start B        int  
   End B          int     
   Size           int
   P value        double
 -----------------------

参数：
CHSList - CHS list
fileName - output file name
抛出：
java.io.IOException - IOException
